Yep, this one is total bullshit, codemasters contracted to many different PC hardware manufacturers for lots of money. They knew it would be largely pirated, so they made up for it by producing a game only those with an EXTREMLeY high-end PC could run. The money is surely pouring in to the harware manufacturers just from those upgrading to play this game, hence, codemasters is also pouring in the spiff money.
They didnt need to make this game so high-end, at all..

Actually it runs well on my 360 as long as I only drive rally, but not the others where you have some live competition. This game is great, but very very poor executed code wise.

I beg to differ, this runs fine with all settings maxed, bar resolution (1280x1024) and no vsync. I only have an 8800gts and 1 gig of ram and an AMD 5000+. Not the best machine on earth, but it handled everything this game threw at it at 30fps+.


p.s. I am using a cut down version of windows xp. not vista.

FOR ANYONE HAVING ISSUES WITH BLACK SCREEN UPON START FOR S.T.A.L.K.E.R AND COLIN MCRAE DIRT: HERE'S MY SOLUTION:

There is a file called adi_oal.dll in directory; c:\windows\system32\adi_oal.dll

Or if you have a 64 bit system;
c:\windows\SysWOW64\adi_oal.dll

DELETE OR RENAME THIS FILE!

I had installed colin mcrae dirt for over 4 months and luckily I found this solution on codemasters forum. And I can play both stalker and colin. Before this, I couldnt play both.

And I didn't need to use no-intro fix. Hope this helps with anyone.
